definition: younger brother/junior male/I (modest word in letter)
wife of younger male cousin via male line/younger cousins via male line
wife of younger male cousin via female line/younger cousins via female line

sentences.english: Give them some money to take their younger siblings out for ice cream.
sentences.chinese: 給他們些零花錢，讓他帶着他的弟妹們去買些冷飲。

sentences.english: Did I help to looking at and then go there at five sisters-in-law?
sentences.chinese: 我在五弟妹那裏幫着看着就行了嗎？

sentences.english: On the move back to sister in law is for the sake of taking care of them all.
sentences.chinese: 正業向弟妹表明自己搬回來是爲了照顧衆人。

sentences.english: As Jane was the eldest, she looked after the others.
sentences.chinese: 珍妮是大姐，所以她照顧其他弟妹。

sentences.english: From one day to the next Inga is left alone with two younger siblings.
sentences.chinese: 英嘉和比她更小的兩個弟妹便日復一日地孤獨地生活。

sentences.english: I am is, sister-in-law's couple was all also affectionate, forgot this gift sons.
sentences.chinese: 我當是，弟妹兩口子太過恩愛，把這禮兒都忘了。

sentences.english: Eldest son is preferentially all sister-in-laws on the right of succession.
sentences.chinese: 在繼承權上長子優先於諸弟妹。

sentences.english: Big boys sometimes domineer their younger brothers and sisters.
sentences.chinese: 大男孩有時會欺壓自己的弟妹們。

sentences.english: He was the eldest in a family of nine children.
sentences.chinese: 華茲是家中老大，有八個弟妹。

sentences.english: Julie hid food so she could feed her younger siblings.
sentences.chinese: 朱莉藏了食物，她可以養活她的弟妹們。

sentences.english: At the work, Dayong began to realize that his wife and her sister were peony flower goddesses .
sentences.chinese: 大用這才知道自己的妻子和弟妹都是牡丹花神變的。

sentences.english: And then my sibs had to rescue me from kidnappers.
sentences.chinese: 然後我的弟妹們還得從綁匪那裏營救我。

definition: older brother's wife/sister-in-law/(polite address to a younger married woman) sister
wife of father's elder brother/aunt/(polite form of address for a woman who is about the age of one's mother)/CL:個|个[ge4]
